responses: Sure, Here are few of the government sponsored loans and schemes :- 1)Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana  2)Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana  3)Atal Pension Yojana  4)Senior Citizens Saving Scheme  5)Ladli Beti Scheme

Yes, these are few of the government sponsored loans and schemes :- 1)Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana  2)Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana  3)Atal Pension Yojana  4)Senior Citizens Saving Scheme  5)Ladli Beti Scheme

patterns: What is Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
Can you please tell me about Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
Give me brief information about Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
Give info regarding Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
Inform me about Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana
responses: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY) is a flagship scheme of Government of India. The scheme facilitates micro credit/Loan up to Rs. 10 lakh to income generating micro enterprises engaged in the non farm sector in manufacturing, processing, trading or service sector. MUDRA supports Financial Intermediaries to extend loans to the non-corporate, non-farm sector income generating activities of micro and small entities. Read more about this here - https://www.myscheme.gov.in/schemes/pmmy

intents.tag: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
patterns: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
Tell me about Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
What is pradhan mantri jyoti bima yojana
Give me brief info regarding pradhan mantri jeevan jyoti bima yojana
Information regarding pradhan mantri jeevan jyothi bima yojana
responses: PMJJBY is an insurance scheme by Ministry of Finance, offering life insurance cover for death due to any reason. It is a one-year cover, renewable from year to year. The scheme is offered / administered through LIC and other Life Insurance companies willing to offer the product on similar terms with necessary approvals and tie ups with Banks / Post office for this purpose. All individual account holders of participating banks/ Post office in the age group of 18 to 50 years are entitled to join. Aadhaar is the primary KYC for the bank / Post office account.Read more about this here - https://www.myscheme.gov.in/schemes/pmjjby

patterns: Tell me about atal pension yojana
Give information regarding atal pension yojana
responses: Atal Pension Yojana (APY) is an old age income security scheme for all the savings account holder between age group 18-40. The scheme also address the longevity risks among the workers in unorganized sector and encourages the workers to voluntarily save for their retirement.Read more about this here - https://www.myscheme.gov.in/schemes/apy

patterns: What is Senior citizen saving scheme
Tell me about senior citizen saving scheme
Give information regarding Senior citizen saving scheme
responses: The Senior Citizens’ Saving Scheme is a retirement benefit program by the Government of India. Individuals over 60 years can opt for the SCSS scheme by investing by making an individual or joint investment. In addition, this scheme provides tax benefits. In SCSS, the installment amount ranges between ₹1,000 and ₹15 lakhs. This amount is constricted to the retirement benefits.Read more about this here - https://www.myscheme.gov.in/schemes/scss

patterns: Tell me about ladli beti scheme
Give information regarding ladli beti scheme
responses: A social assistance scheme sponsored by the Jammu & Kashmir Government for newborn girl child of the Union Territories of J&K and Ladakh born on or after 01/04/2015. The objective of the scheme is to arrest the declining female sex ratio. The scheme further intends to ensure that the girl child does not become a burden for the parent or guardian at the time of her marriage.Read more about this here - https://www.myscheme.gov.in/schemes/lbs
